text: What’s the best way to implement this module with video elements?

best way? not sure. One way you could do it is implement a video thumbnail, and then on click it opens the video in a popup. That way, you don’t have to make a custom video player to match the design and the video itself could be hosted on youtube or what have you.
If you want to match the design you can but the user would have to upload an mp4 file and then you would use various button elements and javascript to make your controls.
So i have to define in module fields with image for thumbnails and url for video
<@U018PH4F1AM> If you are going to use youtube you may want to consider youtube lite by paul irish
I should be compatible with other websites so I will do it as an embed iframe
make sure you lazyload those iframes.. :slightly_smiling_face:
